actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to render assistance to the State of Louisiana to restore Fort St. Jean Baptiste de Natchitoches, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Permits the Secretary of the Interior to assist the State of Louisiana in the restoration of Fort Saint Jean Baptiste de Natchitoches. Requires, as a condition of such assistance, that the fort be maintained as a public historic site.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to render assistance to the State of Louisiana to restore Fort St. Jean Baptiste de Natchitoches, and for other purposes.
